text: Kaphiram (inkara karanaryam) sathi ya jagace jivana susophita kele gele ahe ani te imanadharakanci thatta utavitata, tathapi je allahace bhaya rakhuna duracarapasuna dura rahanare ahe, kayamatacya divasi (darjamadhye) tyacyapeksa phara mothe asatila. Allaha jyala icchito aganita pradana karato
